name: Tetris Game Boy
description:
A nearly pixel perfect reverse engineered game boy Tetris (cutscenes and all) in javascript.  One player only, dudes. Press 'enter' to start the game. Have fun!

Download the source code: here!

Controls are:

  • Arrows - move
  • A key  - rotate clockwise
  • S key - rotate counter clockwise
  • Enter - Start
  • Shift - Select
